name: Design Dreamers Schools
description: Developed a dynamic dashboard allowing users to register as students, select and enroll in classes with Stripe payment integration.Empowered admins to manage users, roles, and class approvals, while instructors could add and update classes.
technologies: HTML, Tailwind CSS, React, React Router, React query, stripe, React Hook Form, jsonwebtoken, Firebase, Express.js, MongoDB

name: Kalabhuna Reastuarent
description: Implemented user registration and login functionality, allowing registered users to add and manage toy details. Implemented dynamic fetching, query routing, sorting, and indexing of toy information on the backend using Express.js and MongoDB technologies.
technologies: Tailwind CSS, React, React Router, React Hook Form, Firebase, Express.js, MongoDB

name: Online Store BD
description: It is a PHP & laravel based E-commerce project. An user can add product to cart, order the product after login, see the previous purses history. Admin can add and manage product, add product category, product brand etc

name: Sports Village
description: Implemented user registration and login functionality, allowing registered users to add and manage toy details. Implemented dynamic fetching, query routing, sorting, and indexing of toy information on the backend using Express.js and MongoDB technologies.
technologies: Tailwind CSS, React, React Router, React Hook Form, Firebase, Express.js, MongoDB

name: Work Opportunitye
